content.question: If <math alttext="the derivative of y, with respect to x, equals, 2 minus y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>−</mo><mi>y</mi></mrow></mrow></math>, and if <math alttext="y equals 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></math> when <math alttext="x equals 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></math>, then <math alttext="y equals" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo></mrow></math>

choices.label: <math alttext="2 minus e to the x minus 1 power" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>−</mo><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></math>

<math alttext="2 minus e to the 1 minus x power" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>−</mo><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup></mrow></math>
<math alttext="2 minus e to the negative x power" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>−</mo><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup></mrow></math>
<math alttext="2 plus e to the negative x power" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup></mrow></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="2 minus e to the 1 minus x power" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>−</mo><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup></mrow></math>

topic.text: 7.6: Finding General Solutions Using Separation of Variables

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
